title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 93.3 - Types of meters eligible for approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 93.3 - Types of meters eligible for approval

State Regulations

Only those types of meters which are completely and
permanently assembled and classified by type by the manufacturer are eligible
for approval by the commission. New types shall conform with the requirements
specified in Acceptable Performance of New Types of Electricity Meters and

Instrument Transformers, of the latest version of the American National

Standard Code for Electricity Metering (ANSI C12). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
93.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
